content.question: Which of the following was a long-term result of the historical process described in the excerpt?

choices.label: African ladinos increasingly became important intermediaries contributing to the growth of the United States domestic slave trade.
The southern United States moved from an economy based on cotton production to one based on rice production.
In the United States, the South and not the North benefited from enslaved peopleâ€™s labor.
The labor of enslaved people came to be foundational to the United States economy.

content.answer: The labor of enslaved people came to be foundational to the United States economy.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
